description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER
query: ((powershell.command.invocation_details:*rundll32.exe* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*rundll32.exe*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*shell32.dll* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*shell32.dll*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*shellexec_rundll* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*shellexec_rundll*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*powershell* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*powershell*))
author: Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
